articles.description: Lula made the comments in Uruguay, which has been pursuing its own commercial deal with Beijing, despite opposition from Mercosur, made up of Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay and Paraguay
articles.content:

articles.title: Zlatan Ibrahimovic makes U-turn on Lionel Messi and delivers "lack of respect" blast
articles.description: Zlatan Ibrahimovic has taken aim at Argentina's players for "behaving badly" during their World Cup celebrations but does appear to have changed his mind on Lionel Messi
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina soy sales lag previous year at 80.6% of harvest
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Jan 25 (Reuters) - Soybean sales from Argentina's 2021/2022 harvest covered 80.6% of the 44 million tonne harvest as of last week, below the 82.6% sold from the previous season at the same time, data from its agricultural ministry showed Wednesday.Between Jan.
